FuncDef: The display arp vpn-instance command displays the Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) entries of a VPN instance.
CLIs: display arp vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> slot <slot-id> [ dynamic | static ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays ARP entries of the board in a specified slot.
If this command is run in the view of a logical interface that resides on the main control board, the value is 0.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays the ARP entries of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31.

Examples: IP ADDRESS      MAC ADDRESS     EXPIRE(M) TYPE        INTERFACE   VPN-INSTANCE
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check ARP entries or locate ARP faults of a specified VPN instance, run the display arp vpn-instance command.
